title: Can I sort albums of an artist by release date in iTunes Store? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes, right click the top bar where it shows "name" "artist" "time" "genre" etc, and select "release date", once its on the bar, all you need to do is left click it and it will sort by it. edit:this is not currently available on the iTunes store, I misunderstood and thought he was referring to iTunes´s music playback
